data.text: @moondusthobi yes i really hope so 🥺🥺
@blueXmono Hopefully your immune systen got used to it with the first shot. My second vaccine shot was a lot chiller than the first one so let's hope it's going to be the same for you🥺💖
@moondusthobi you're sweet 🥺🥺💖💖 yes i'm so happy!! I truly hope it doesn't come back when i take the next shot in a few weeks 😭
@blueXmono Yaaaaay I'm so so happy darling🥺💖💖💖💖 I was so worried, I'm happy it really was a temporary side effect
@moondusthobi right now I don't feel anything so hopefully it's not coming back 🥺🥺
@blueXmono Thank god🥺🥺💖 I hope you will really get better for good
@moondusthobi it feels better for everyday luckily 🥺
@blueXmono I'm so glad to hear that darling🥺 this scare was big enough, it should really go away now sigh
@moondusthobi things have luckily been a little better, still not fully recovered but at least it's manageble now 😭
@blueXmono My poor babie:(( how have you been feeling nowdays? Does the breathing situation got a bit better?
@moondusthobi yeah i've heard that as well, i've been feeling so shit since the first shot so i might not even be able to take a second tbh 😭

@blueXmono Every country has different informations I can't😭 it will turn out sooner or later, the only thing I know is that these two vaccines give one the most antibodies out of all the available ones
@moondusthobi oh really? I heard it only lasts a few months, i don't think anyone really knows tho 😭

@blueXmono Not yet, though I'm thinking about getting one because I like getting vaccines shjshjs but I can only get it around october anyway. Honestly a new shot will be needed after some while for sure, though I read that pfizer/moderna lasts for quite a few years
@moondusthobi I meant third 🤦‍♀️ i think we will probably get a third here as well but in a year or something like that

@blueXmono Yess, at the beginning of June I got my second shot. I have the feeling that at some point the third shot really is going to be mandatory, especially because we're really acting like rona is on holiday

@moondusthobi ohh thanks for the advice, i deffo will 
Oh really??? Have you gotten your second shot yet?

@blueXmono Definitely recommend ice on the arms, my left arm was in pain for a week because I wad lazy shjshjs
They are overdoing it just a tiny bit shjshjs meanwhile here we can get a third shot after 4 months of the second one shjshsjjs AND by mixing different vaccines, a real adventure

@moondusthobi yes i'm so happy it worked out in the end 🙏 guessing my arm will be stiff on vacation then sbsjks 
I guess it's a good thing they are being careful but I think that was a bit over the top tbh sjsjsj

@blueXmono My poor babie🥺 I'm so happy it got fixed at the end!!🥺💖💖 it would have been so stupid if you couldn't get vaccinated, here people wasn't even checked for anything and then there's Sweden where they overdo the checking, the other side of the coin.

@moondusthobi i honestly don't understand either... luckily i didn't cancel the appointment next week and i've talked to a doctor so it's fine for me to take it next week. But i was so disappointed, no joke i cried for like 2 hours straight after i didn't get vaccinated 🥺
@blueXmono Nooo:(( it makes no sense, I know you have a lot of allergies but I'm not sure how the vaccine would trigger any of them
@sunflowsy_ yes i'm so relieved 💜💜
@blueXmono Ohh, that's good, everything will be fine 💞
@sunflowsy_ I talked to a doctor today and I can take it in two weeks luckily 🥺🥺
@blueXmono ohh noo 😭😭, don't worry, you'll definitely get your vaccine as soon as possible🙏
@sunflowsy_ hopefully i can take it in two weeks, i was so disapointed that i cried for like two hours 😭
@blueXmono Ohh no :( I hope they solve the problem, it was finally your turn to get the vaccine 😦
@blueXmono Förstår det :/
@oliiiviaap Tur att du gjorde det, annars hade du nog inte heller fått ta. Ja det suger...jag är så sjukt besviken :((
@blueXmono Ah jag har bokat på en vårdcentral, tur! Men så tråkigt att du inte fick den idag 😔
@oliiiviaap Man får nog ta om man gör det på en vårdcentral, de ville att jag skulle kontakta 1177 för säkerhetsskull
@blueXmono men gud jag är också allergisk mot mycket undra om jag kommer att få ta då 😓
@oliiiviaap de hade ingen läkare på plats och var rädda att jag skulle få en allergisk reaktion... så besviken
@blueXmono Vänta va?? Varför inte? 😮😧
